english.segment1: Love, should it be so tragic?. Should it be dramatic?. Should it take such a toll on you?
english.segment2: Trust, why is our trust faded?. Jesus says to trade them. Trade our scars for His promises
english.segment3: So give Him all your love this time. And give Him everything you are this time. You've never been so lucky. To have a friend like Jesus
english.segment4: Wait, how long will you wait here?. Your life longs for a new year. Your healing must begin somewhere
